share on x jt joseph t. jun 12 at 11:13 pm joseph t. purchased the basket full of wishes for the family of craig allen vandegriffe. share on x kh kyle henry. jun 12 at 5:34 pm i had the privilege of watching craig grow up with my younger brother clayton. from the days hanging out in my mom's basement (see terry a henry-flowers post) to his days serving our country, we had some great times. thank you craig for always making time for me and my family when we used to come back in town. you will be missed my friend. until we meet again.-kyle and jackie henry. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bd beth durham-gillett. jun 12 at 2:15 pm his service to our country will never be forgotten. keeping his family in our thoughts and prayers. blue star mothers of america - houston texas chapter. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x th terry a. henry-flowers. jun 11 at 11:37 pm 2 files added to the album new album name comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x cw cindy ward. jun 11 at 9:10 pm lit a candle in memory of craig allen vandegriffe. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bj bobbi jojun 11 at 8:42 pm lit a candle in memory of craig allen vandegriffe. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x christina gabriel. jun 11 at 3:17 pm 1 file added to the album new album name comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x christina gabriel. jun 11 at 3:11 pm 1 file added to the album new album name comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... burial. jun 13. hawthorn memorial gardens4205 horner road. jefferson city, mo, us, 65109. get missed the service?
